summary: This document is a brief email exchange from July 12, 2019, forwarding a New York Post article link. The article's headline indicates that Jeffrey Epstein's jail cell was located three doors down from that of Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, which reports on his jail cell location at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Joaquín Guzmán
persons.context: Referred to by his alias "El Chapo"; his cell is noted as being near Epstein's cell in the same correctional facility.

connections.description: Both were inmates housed in proximity to each other at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, as reported in a news article.

events.title: News report on Epstein's jail cell location
events.description: A New York Post article reports that Jeffrey Epstein's cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center is three doors down from that of Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán.

keyFacts: The document is an email from July 12, 2019, forwarding a link to a New York Post article.
The article headline states Jeffrey Epstein's jail cell was three doors down from Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán's cell.
This indicates both high-profile inmates were housed in the same facility, the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
